import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Home = ({products}) => { return (
{/* CATEGORIES */}
{/* Card*/}
{/* Background */}
{/* Body */}
{/* Heading */}
Summer Hats
{/* Link */} Shop Now
{/* Card*/}
{/* Background */}
{/* Body */}
{/* Heading */}
Men Hats
{/* Link */} Shop Now
{/* Card*/}
{/* Background */}
{/* Body */}
{/* Heading */}
Floral Dresses
{/* Link */} Shop Now
{/* ARRIVALS */}
{/* Heading */}

New Arrivals

{products.map(({ id, name, image, price }, index) => (
{/* Card */}
{/* Badge */}
New
{/* Image */}
{/* Collapse */}
{/* Body */}
{/* Title */} {name}
{/* Price */}
{price}$
{/* Footer */}
))}
) } Home.propTypes = { } export default Home
